meanings.definition: The state or quality of being omnicompetent.
meanings.sent1: Her omnicompetences were evident as she effortlessly managed all aspects of the project.
meanings.sent2: The CEO's omnicompetences allowed him to lead the company through various challenges.
meanings.sent3: Despite his lack of experience, his omnicompetences shone through in the kitchen, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The teacher's omnicompetences were like a magic wand, solving any classroom issue with ease.
meanings.sent5: In the world of superheroes, her omnicompetences made her the most powerful of them all.

meanings.definition: The ability to handle any task or situation effectively.
meanings.sent1: His omnicompetences in problem-solving made him the go-to person in the office.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter's omnicompetences were crucial in saving lives during the emergency.
meanings.sent3: Even in the chaos of the party, her omnicompetences in socializing stood out.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's omnicompetences on the field were unmatched, leading his team to victory.
meanings.sent5: The detective's omnicompetences in solving mysteries made him legendary in the city.
